titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Female authors of Kings County list 1995.008
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:17:06 +0000.

did.unittitle: Female authors of Kings County list
did.abstract: A bound volume, titled Model County Records. County of Kings, that features a typewritten list of female authors who resided in Kings County, N.Y. during the 19th century. The list is typewritten, alphabetical by surname, and lists the titles of books, magazine, and newspaper articles written by each author. In the back of the volume is an index organized alphabetically by surname.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Female authors of Kings County list, 1995.008, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1995.
